sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User, ShoppingBag, Heart, MessageCircle, Settings, Star, MapPin, Phone, Mail, Eye, Calendar, Package, CreditCard, Award, TrendingUp, ArrowUp, Store, Plus } from 'lucide-react'; const UserProfile = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); // Mock user data - in real app this would come from API/auth context const userData = { id: 'user_123', firstName: 'John', lastName: 'Doe', email: 'john.doe@example.com', phone: '+1 (555) 123-4567', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face', location: { city: 'New York', state: 'NY', country: 'USA' }, accountType: 'buyer', // 'buyer' or 'seller' canSell: false, // true after upgrade stats: { totalPurchases: 12, totalSpent: 850, favoriteItems: 23, reviewsGiven: 8, rating: 4.6, // as a buyer reviewCount: 5 }, joinedDate: '2023-06-15', membershipLevel: 'Silver', // Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum isVerified: true }; // Simple tabs for buyers only const buyerTabConfig = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: User }, { id: 'orders', label: 'Order History', icon: ShoppingBag }, { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending Orders', icon: Package }, { id: 'wishlist', label: 'Wishlist', icon: Heart }, { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: Settings } ]; const statsCards = [ { title: 'Total Orders', value: userData.stats.totalPurchases, icon: ShoppingBag, color: 'blue' }, { title: 'Total Spent', value: userData.stats.totalSpent, icon: CreditCard, color: 'green', prefix: '$' }, { title: 'Wishlist Items', value: userData.stats.favoriteItems, icon: Heart, color: 'red' }, { title: 'Reviews Given', value: userData.stats.reviewsGiven, icon: Star, color: 'yellow' } ]; const handleUpgradeToSeller = () => { // In real app, this would make API call to upgrade account // For now, redirect to simple seller dashboard window.location.href = '/sell/dashboard'; }; return (
{/* Header */}

My Profile

{userData.location.city}, {userData.location.state} {userData.membershipLevel} Member Joined {new Date(userData.joinedDate).toLocaleDateString()} {userData.isVerified && ( ✓ Verified )}
{!userData.canSell && ( )}
{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{buyerTabConfig.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
{/* Content */}
{activeTab === 'overview' && ( )} {activeTab === 'orders' && ( )} {activeTab === 'pending' && ( )} {activeTab === 'wishlist' && ( )} {activeTab === 'settings' && ( )}
); }; // Overview Tab Component (Simple Buyer Profile) const OverviewTab = ({ statsCards, userData }) => (
{/* Stats Cards */}
{statsCards.map((card, index) => { const Icon = card.icon; return (

{card.title}

{card.prefix}{card.value}

); })}

))}
); // Order History Tab const OrderHistoryTab = ({ userId }) => { const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('all'); return (
{/* Filters */}
{/* Orders List */}
{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map(i => (

Order #{12340 + i}

Placed on Dec {i}, 2023

{i <= 2 ? 'Delivered' : i === 3 ? 'Shipping' : 'Pending'}

Product Name {i}

Quantity: 1

); }; // Pending Orders Tab const PendingOrdersTab = ({ userId }) => (

); // Wishlist Tab const WishlistTab = ({ userId }) => (

); // Messages Tab (same as before) const MessagesTab = ({ userId }) => (

); // Settings Tab (same as before) const SettingsTab = ({ userData }) => (

); export default UserProfile;
